import NavItem from "../common/NavItem"; import Link from "next/link"; import $ from "jquery"; class Navbar extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.props = { title: "CXC Spanish Guide" }; } componentDidMount() { $(".navbar-burger").click(function() { $(".navbar-burger").toggleClass("is-active"); $(".navbar-menu").toggleClass("is-active"); }); } render() { return (

{props.title}

Exam Topics
Verb Tenses
); } } export default Navbar;
